Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: Great African restaurant. Food was freshly prepared and the Mongozo beer is definitely worth a try as it comes in unique flavors; we had coconut and mango. We ordered the chef's combinations special, which came with chicken, pork, and lamb. The lamb was our favorite. Since the food is made fresh, it does take a while, but worth the wait.

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: Our friend took us here and she couldn‚Äôt pick a better place for dinner. Delicious food, drinks and very friendly atmosphere. The way the food is served is unlike anywhere else we‚Äôve been before. If you ever come to Amsterdam you should definitely go here and experience it üëåüèª

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: The food was tasty but the portions were too small for us. You can find some African beers! Family style place so the decor is a bit tacky but adds to the character I suppose :)

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text:
Food was tasty, but the servings were ridiculously small. For example 4‚Ç¨ for 2 tiny samossas. Cutlery was not provided, we had to use our hands. But that made it somehow authentic and we liked it.  The service was very kind.
I would rate it higher if servings were bigger.

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: The nicest Ethiopian, Eritrean food I've had anywhere in the world. Simple, excellent food and relaxing environment, with friendly staff.

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: Azmarino has been and still is my favourite Ethiopian Restaurant in Amsterdam. I recommend to order the mixed plate, with the chef‚Äôs selection. It‚Äôs a variety of meats, vegetables and flavours. Or completely vegetarian if you like. Choose ‚Ä¶

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: We had an awesome stay. The owner is really kind and the service was excellent. By far one of the most formative culinary experiences. ‚Ä¶

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: Food was alright. I really liked the lady who served us. She was very nice.

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: Went here for dinner before the lockdown in October and the food was fabulous! Service was great and super friendly as well. Hope they reopen soon!!

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: Food was delicious!  The whole African experience is very special.  The amount of food they serve is great.  I didn't expect I would get so full when I saw the plate, but magically in the end I didn't have any room for dessert.  Plus the service is great and the price is totally affordable.

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: Went in thinking I wouldn't be full from the small portion of meat they served but boy, was i wrong. Food is amazing with excellent service. Unfortunately, we did not have room for dessert, would've love to try the chocolate cake though. Definitely recommend the banana and mango beer.

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: A nice Ethiopian restaurant with tasty dishes and great beers. Loved the mango beer served in a coconut :-) I also love the fact that you're supposed to eat with your hands from a big plate and share all the food together. Definitely a bonding experience.

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: 5/10 men's toilet is very small, ok clean, there was no more towels to dry hands.

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: Not enough good things can be said about this place. Truly local business with food for the soul. The African beers were a treat.

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: Very impressed with the food, especially for the price! Great value, super friendly staff and nice atmosphere. Very filling considering the portion sizes. The mango beer was excellent as well. Could not recommend highly enough!

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: Such a fantastic restaurant and experience. Both the customers and Mek were incredibly friendly, but above all, the food is amazing. This was my first experience with Ethiopian food and I was blown away by the flavours. Will absolutely be back!

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: Simple, relaxed restaurant serving delicious food. The owners are also quite friendly which adds to the great experience. We tried the vegetarian and meat sample platter and loved everything on it. One note: the place is cash only!

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: One of my favourite places in Amsterdam for a casual meal out. The service is great, the prices are very reasonable and the food is delicious & there's always plently of it! ‚Ä¶

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: Very authentic eastern african food, definitely an interesting experience using the special sour pancakes to eat the meal with. The hostess was helpful and very friendly. ‚Ä¶

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: Tasteful food, but not served very warm. Portions are good, price is relatively low. The restaurant was quite cold during a winter evening.. Feels like a budget style restaurant, perhaps not the best choice for extended meals.

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: Incredible food, so flavourful and savoury.I would recommend this restaurant to anyone visiting Amsterdam that enjoys eating out and is interested in trying something new! Waitstaff was very friendly, I would recommend trying the coconut beer.

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: Highly recommended! Awesome service, delicious African food and a nice atmosphere. Definitely will come back!

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text:
If you want to go for a classic Ethiopian experience, just order the main course and some beers.
Be sure to order the mango, coconut or banana beer. They're served in a ‚Ä¶

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text:
Yummo!!!!Awesome communal eating. Veg optionz were delish. Great price for a full belly. Cute little place with quirky paintings and decor. Love love love it.
Clean bathrooms also.

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: Have been coming here for years; amazing food. Even possible to do 100% vegan. Best service in Amsterdam!!

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: A good taste of East Africa in Amsterdam. They were out of their signature salad. Injira was also too sour. Otherwise good food that's affordable

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: Authentic delicious East African food for very reasonable prices. Very friendly service. Try their amazing mango beer.

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: This is a real gem in Amsterdam: great food, super friendly service, reasonable prices and you don't have to make a reservation! Absolutely love it!

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: Amazing food! Absolutely loved both of the dishes we ordered. Would definitely come back.

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: Very interesting and definitely worth visiting!!! Food is extremely delicious and served very quickly. Selection of drinks and sides available. Can't miss it!!!

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: Amazing service, great food, out of the box and bonding eating experience. Bring a date, your friends or your mom:)

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: I've eaten a lot of Ethiopian food.  This place is definitely above average.  The prices were also very reasonable and the service friendly and quick.

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: Great food, wonderful ambience small and cozy, kind host, very well prepared dishes, the beers are a variety, the chocolate souffle with cake was absolutely mouth watering.

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: I like coconut beer and so tasty food, Friendly staff and a reasonable price  :)  LEKKER!!!!

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: Went there twice already since October. Super delicious, great deal, nicest staff, cosy setting! Better reserve!

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: Good food, nice beers and friendly staff. Close to de Pijp but down a nice quiet street so it's lovely to sit outside when it's sunny!

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: Delicious food and great portion sizes. Absolutely stuffed by the end. Service was also fantastic!

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: Nice atmosphere,  very friendly, decent prices,  great food. .. especially the beef and chicken dishes.

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: I highly recommend this place. Good food, friendly atmosphere very reasonable prices. Great all round

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: Delicious and wonderful staff! Great banana beers üçª

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: Nice place with friendly staff and excellent African plates. Don't miss the chocolate cake

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text:
Great food and cozy place, people are real nice.
I recommend the banana beer

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: Really nice place to visit in Amsterdam. Away from the crowds, it has delicious dishes and beers.

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: The food was delicious, and the service equally impeccable! A perfect 5/5, without question!

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: Friendy staff, really tasty food. I highly reccommend this restaurant.

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: Friendly staff, great service, and very tasty food - all for a reasonable price!

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: Wonderful couple that runs the place. The food is equally as wonderful. Neighborhood gem.

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: Nice simple place, good food. If only the toilet seat would stay up

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: Super friendly staff, relaxed with tasty ass food not bad on the ol pocket either

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: Friendly staff, nice variety of food and good beer

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: Great staff, nice food, and very interesting experience.

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: Amazing food and excellent service. Simple and Good!

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: best restaurant in amsterdam, we had a great time and a great meal

Name: Restaurant Azmarino
Review Text: Great african food for affordable prices with nice african beers

Review Text: Great restaurant with a lovely owner !
